titleStmt.title: Topica sacra: spiritual logick: some brief hints and helps to faith, meditation, and prayer, comfort and holiness. / Communicated at Christ-Church, Dublin, in Ireland. By T.H. minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, 1619-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Titon, and are to be sold at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
